other_tests.findings: A well-defined hyperactive area of 2.5-cm diameter in the right caudal pole, suggesting a parathyroid adenoma.
Sinus bradycardia with short QT time.

Confirmed the presence of a 15x10-15 mm parathyroid adenoma at the right caudal pole, a small suppressed parathyroid gland in the upper pole, and colloid cysts without parathyroid tissue in the tissue from left lobe.
